title: Chicken piperade with pilau rice
description: This delicious chicken stew is an easy dish to bung in the oven, the pilau rice adds fragrant depth of flavour.
ingredients: 1 x 1.5kg/3lb 5oz chicken, giblets removed, jointed into 8 pieces
4 red peppers, seeds removed, thickly sliced
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
